body: The panels where she has one nipple erect and another inverted are so fucking hot.

Oh. I've read this on Fakku. The guy is a jerk. He only dated her because he wants to brag about having a beautiful GF. Then, he kept forcing her until the GF told her problems to her friends. They make out and reconcile at the end and the guy promised that he'll change, but it was hinted at the last panel that he's still a douchebag and the reason why he still wanted to date her is to at least not be an outcast and maintain his position at school.
Did she deliberately get him socially isolated so he'd have only her? And then threaten to break up to manipulate him into treating her better since she was all he had left at that point?
這到底是什麼劇情喔齁齁齁齁齁
